projectDesc.p: The project DHARMA has received funding from the European Research Council (ERC) under the European Union's Horizon 2020 research and innovation programme (grant agreement no 809994).

prefixDef.p: Public URIs with the prefix bib to point to a Zotero Group Library named ERC-DHARMA whose data are open to the public.
Internal URIs using the part prefix to point to person elements in the DHARMA_idListMembers_v01.xml file.

div.p:
svasti śrī brahmatecam tirukkaḻumalattut tirunāmattuk kāṇikku pramā-ṇap paṭi taṭi uḷvarikkuk kalveṭṭu viḷainilam brahmāṇappaṟṟu talaiccaṇkāṭ-ṭuvatikku kiḻakkut tillaiviṭaṇkavāykkālukkut teṟku 1 1 catirattu @ itil tiṭarum kulaiyum @ nikki @ 2 1 catirattu @ ivvatikku kiḻakku jananāyavāykālukkut teṟku 2 1 catirattu @ iṇke @ cuttamalivatikku meṟku tillaiviṭaṇkavāykkālukkut teṟku 1 3 catirattu @ ivvatikku meṟku jananāyavāykālukkut teṟku 1 2 catirattu @ itil kuḷamum kulaiyum @ nikki @ eṭuttapātavatikku meṟku rājendracoḻavāykālukku teṟku 1 1 catirattu @ itaṉ kiḻakku @ 2 1 catirattu @ niṉṟāṉavāykā-lukku vaṭakku 1@ itil tiṭar @ Ψ nikki @ cuttamalivatikku kiḻakku niṉṟāṉvāykālukku vaṭakku 2 1 catirattu @ 2 2ntuṇṭattu @ āṟpāvaiyil parivattitta ḻaṉ paṟṟil poṉṉampalanampikku veḷḷāṉ paṟṟil parivattitta @ āka @ nikki @ veḷḷāṉ paṟṟu talaicaṇkāṭṭuvatikku kiḻakku jananāyavāykālukku teṟku 1 2 catirattu @ 3 2 catirattu @ eṭuttapā-tavatikku meṟku rājendracoḻavāykālukku teṟku 2 mutaṟtuṇṭattu @ itil kuḷa @ nikki @ niṉṟānvāykālukku vaṭakku 1 2 catirattu @ 3 tuṇṭattu @ itil tiṭar @ nikki @ kaṭṭaḷai eṭuttapātavatikku meṟku
ninṟānvāykkālukku vaṭakku 2 3 catirattu @ itil kulamum kulaiyum @ nikki @ iṇke @ iṇke @ itil kuḷamum tiṭarum @ nikki @ ivvatikku meṟku tillaiyāḷivāykkālukku vaṭakku 1 1 catirattu @ eṇkaṭṭaḷai cuttamalivatikku kiḻakku ninṟānvāykālukku vaṭakku 2 2 tuṇṭattu tillaiyāḷivāykālukku vaṭakku 1 1 catirattu @ itil tiṭar @ nikki @ iṇke @ itil puṉcey @ nikki @ 2 tuṇṭattu @ kaṭṭaḷai cuttamalivatikku meṟku rājendracoḻavāykālukku teṟku 2 2 catirattu vācciyan araiyatevan pukaliviṭaṇkan uḷḷiṭṭār pakkal koṇṭa itil āḷuṭaiΨyapiḷḷaiyār tirunāmattu niṇkalāka nikkina @ nikki teṟkaṭaiya puñce @ itil innāyanār tevatāṉam viḷainilam nikki puncey @ tillaiviṭaṇkavāykālukku teṟku 1 2 catirattu vatakkaṭaiya kulottuṇkacoḻap iramamārāyar pakkal vilai koṇṭa puṉcey @ 3 catirattu vaṭakkaṭaiya cāvāntiyārkaḷ uḷḷiṭṭār pakkal vilai koṇṭa puṉcey 2 1 catirattu puncey @ 2ntuṇṭattu cāvāntiuyyaniṉṟā-ṭuvāṉ puṉcey @ jenanāyavāykālukku teṟku 1 1 tuṇṭattu caṇṭeśvara nampi uḷḷiṭṭār pakkal koṇṭa puṉcey @ 2ntuṇṭattu kāṭeṟṟuk kollai @ eṭuttapātavatikku meṟku tillaiviṭaṇkavāykālukku teṟku 2 1 tuṇṭattu @ kaṭṭaḷai eṭuttapātavati
kku meṟku rājendracoḻavāykālukku teṟku 1 1 catirattu teṟkaṭainta kiḻakkaṭaiya @ iṇku viṭṭu vaṭameṟkaṭaiya gaṇanāyaṉ tiruvagniśvaramu-ṭaiyāṉ pakkal vilai koṇṭa @ iṇke kolamākiniṉṟāṉ uḷḷiṭṭār pakkal vilai koṇṭa @ āka @ iṇke vaṭakkaṭainta @ puncey @ ivvatikku meṟku ivvāykālukku vaṭakku 1 1 catirattu teṟkaṭaiya @vil kuṇṭilaṉ tiruttoṇi-puramuṭaiyāṉ @ ulokacūḷāmaṇivatikku meṟku niṉṟāṉvāykālukku vaṭakku 1 2ntuṇṭattu puṉcey @ kaṭṭaḷai eṭuttapātavatikku meṟku niṉṟāṉvāykā-lukku vaṭakku 1 2 catirattu puṉcey @ 3ntuṇṭattu puṉcey @ cuttamalivatikku meṟku rājendracoḻavāykālukku vaṭakku 1 3 catirattu tillaikkūt-tāṇṭār pakkal vilai koṇṭa @ ekaṭṭaḷai cuttamalivatikku kiḻakkuttu puṉcey @ Ψ
